transcript:
Customer: Aap jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, vah anya call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kare ya kuch samay pashchat prayas kare. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir, vo call disconnect ho gaya tha actually aapka.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan haan. To abhi aapke doubt clear hai na ya phir aur bhi koi doubt hai aap bataiye.
Customer: Abhi unhone bola aapko mere ko pata nahi tha na mere ko notification aaya tha abhi thodi der pehle. Haan haan. To phir use kar lo main aapko.
Executive: Koi na, koi na sir. Abhi aapke paas aaj ka bhi time hai, aapke paas kal ka bhi time hai. Aap kal tak isko consume kar sakte hain. Kal night mein hoga aapka jaake.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Haan ji. Haan ji. Okay. Aur ek cheez main aapko aur bolungi jaise aapke kal account manager ne bhi aapke saath video meet kiya tha to unke paas aapke aapke paas unka personal number nahi hai sir jahan pe unko directly aap coordinate kar sakte ho?
Customer: Number to unhone share kiya hoga apna.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Hai na? To aap na customer care ji aap na customer care ke number pe call karne se better na aap unko hi directly call kiya karo kyunki vo bhi aapke ek tarah se customer care hi hain. Aapko agar koi bhi chota sa chota problem aata hai aap unko directly coordinate karoge na to vo bhi aapko is problem ka solution denge sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji. Unhone mere ko number diya tha mere ko abhi yaad aaya.
Executive: Haan haan. Koi dikkat nahi hai. Ek kaam main aur kar deti hu. Main unki manager se baat kar rahi thi. Main aapko apna number bhi ek baar WhatsApp pe forward kar de rahi hu. Aap mera number bhi save kar lijiye. If agar vo aapko response nahi kar pa rahe hain aap mujhe directly message drop kar dijiyega. Theek hai? Main aapko phir vahan pe aapka jo bhi problem rahega vo uska hum ek baar baat karke solution kar lenge. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay ma'am. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Aur ye kal jaise aapka concern close hua tha to aapke paas ek feedback gaya tha sir jahan pe aapne yes mark kiya tha satisfy yes right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan same aaj main close karungi aapka ye concern na to aapke paas vapas se ek feedback mail jayega mere feedback ke liye. To vahan par I hope abhi aap satisfy honge vahan pe aap positive feedback de payenge mere liye.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji de dunga.
Executive: Right. Theek hai. To main abhi concern phir aapka close kar du na sir jo aapne abhi 9696 pe call kiya tha?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Main isko close kar deti hu. Apna number share kar deti hu main aapko personally. Aapka ye same number WhatsApp pe rahega sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Main aapko WhatsApp pe apne number se hi share karti hu. Aap please save kar lijiyega. Kahin pe kuch koi bhi dikkat aata hai sir services mein aap mujhe please directly coordinate kariye. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay ma'am. Haan ji.
Executive: Okay ji. Okay sir. Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was unaware of buyleads expiring.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified validity of buyleads.

- Executive shared personal number for direct assistance.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, feedback, whatsapp
